models.user: API key-based identity for syncing flashcard data between devices. Manages authentication via hashed API keys.
models.practiceSettings: Global practice preferences that apply to all practice sessions. Includes max cards per review and max retries for difficult cards.
models.syncSettings: Device sync configuration using API keys. Tracks whether an API key is active and when the last sync occurred.
models.exportHistory: Tracks when the user last exported their flashcard data as a backup.

relationships: User has one set of practice settings
User has one set of sync settings
User can generate one active API key at a time (revoke to generate a new one)
Export history tracks the most recent data export timestamp
